description: Cleaning: 1.Remove the temporary tattoo with Oil. Temporary tattoos can be easily removed with the help of oil. 2.Use Cosmetic or home-made scrub. You can use any skin friendly cosmetic scrub or can make a homemade scrub using gram flour, honey, yoghurt & turmeric. Gently rub the scrub for a minute in a circular motion on the tattoo. After a minute of rubbing, the tattoo will break up and the fleck will start leaving the skin. 3.Various removers like make-up remover, nail-polish remover & rubbing alcohol can be used for removing the temporary tattoos.
